mapper.select: select NB_TITLE, NB_CONTENT, NB_NO, NB_INDATE, NB_VIEWS from NOTICE_BOARD nb where NB_DELETE_YN = 'N'
select QA_TITLE, QA_CONTENT, QA_NO, QA_INDATE from QA_BOARD qb where QA_DELETE_YN = 'N'

select ib.IB_NO, IB_CONTENT, IB_INDATE, ia.IA_NO, IA_CONTENT, IA_INDATE, ic.IC_NO, ic.IC_NAME, ib.U_NO, ia.U_NO, uv.u_nickname from INQUIRY_BOARD ib full join INQUIRY_ANSWER ia on ia.IB_NO = ib.IB_NO full join INQUIRY_CATEGORY ic on ib.IC_NO = ic.IC_NO join USER_VIBEVILLAGE uv on ib.U_NO = uv.U_NO
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE_BOARD (NB_NO, NB_TITLE, NB_CONTENT, NB_INDATE, NB_UPDATE, NB_DELETE, NB_DELETE_YN, NB_VIEWS, U_NO) VALUES (NOTICE_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nbTitle}, #{nbContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, 'N', 1, 1)
INSERT INTO QA_BOARD (QA_NO, QA_TITLE, QA_CONTENT, QA_INDATE, QA_UPDATE, QA_DELETE, QA_DELETE_YN, U_NO) VALUES (QA_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qaTitle}, #{qaContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, 'N', 1)
mapper.update: update Notice_BOARD set NB_DELETE = default, NB_DELETE_YN = 'Y' where NB_NO = #{nbNo}
update QA_BOARD set QA_DELETE = default, QA_DELETE_YN = 'Y' where QA_NO = #{qaNo}
mapper.insert: insert into INQUIRY_BOARD (IB_NO, IB_CONTENT, IB_INDATE, U_NO, IC_NO) values (INQUIRY_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ibContent}, sysdate, 1, #{icNo})
mapper.select: select ib.IB_NO, IB_CONTENT, IB_INDATE, ia.IA_NO, IA_CONTENT, IA_INDATE, ic.IC_NO, ic.IC_NAME, ib.U_NO, ia.U_NO, uv.u_nickname from INQUIRY_BOARD ib full join INQUIRY_ANSWER ia on ia.IB_NO = ib.IB_NO full join INQUIRY_CATEGORY ic on ib.IC_NO = ic.IC_NO full join USER_VIBEVILLAGE uv on ib.U_NO = uv.U_NO where ib.IB_NO = #{ibNo}
